channel.title: Case Studies
channel.description: See how advertisers and publishers found affiliate marketing success with these CJ case studies.

item.title: eharmony Leans on CJ's Growth Consultant Team to Run Successful Search Strategies
item.description: Online dating platform, eharmony, leverages the CJ platform and CJ’s Growth Consultant team to maximize their opportunity with affiliate customers resulting in a successful TM+ campaign and a fantastic new partnership.
item.content:encoded: Online dating platform, eharmony, leverages the CJ platform and CJ’s Growth Consultant team to maximize their opportunity with affiliate customers resulting in a successful TM+ campaign and a fantastic new partnership.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: RS Components Wins Competitive Market Share with Incentive Publishers
item.description: Through a strategy fronted by the tactical use of cashback rates and adjustments to their referral window, RS Components managed to break their competitor’s 16-year dominance in the affiliate channel, grow revenue, and strengthen publisher partnerships.
item.content:encoded: Through a strategy fronted by the tactical use of cashback rates and adjustments to their referral window, RS Components managed to break their competitor’s 16-year dominance in the affiliate channel, grow revenue, and strengthen publisher partnerships.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Norton’s APAC Expansion with CJ Affiliate Results in Major Growth
item.description: Norton, global leader in cyber safety and security, worked with CJ Affiliate to expand into the APAC region and experienced growth in sales, new customers, and overall revenue.
item.content:encoded: Norton, global leader in cyber safety and security, worked with CJ Affiliate to expand into the APAC region and experienced growth in sales, new customers, and overall revenue.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Major Service Provider Increases Return & Efficiency with CJ's Affiliate Customer Journey Reporting
item.description: A global home and business services brand leveraged CJ’s Affiliate Customer Journey reporting to diversify media partners which resulted in increased ROAS and growth in new customer contracts.
item.content:encoded: A global home and business services brand leveraged CJ’s Affiliate Customer Journey reporting to diversify media partners which resulted in increased ROAS and growth in new customer contracts.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Consumer Electronics Brand Sees Big Growth from Recruitment & Activation
item.description: A new-to-affiliate consumer electronics advertiser leverages CJ Affiliate to recruit and activate publishers to grow revenue internationally, demonstrating the importance of publisher recruitment for a diverse portfolio.
item.content:encoded: A new-to-affiliate consumer electronics advertiser leverages CJ Affiliate to recruit and activate publishers to grow revenue internationally, demonstrating the importance of publisher recruitment for a diverse portfolio.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Lacoste Grows Key Content Relationships after Migration to CJ
item.description: Lacoste selected CJ to devise and execute a multi-pronged content strategy focused on building the high-end retail brand in order to drive adoption with luxury consumers.
item.content:encoded: Lacoste selected CJ to devise and execute a multi-pronged content strategy focused on building the high-end retail brand in order to drive adoption with luxury consumers.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Autodesk Leverages CJ Affiliate for Successful APAC Expansion
item.description: CJ Affiliate helps drive successful expansion into the Asia Pacific region for world leader in design software.
item.content:encoded: CJ Affiliate helps drive successful expansion into the Asia Pacific region for world leader in design software.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Fanatics and NMPi Leverage Dynamic Data via Paid Search to Grow Revenue through Affiliate
item.description: Fanatics, the leading e-commerce partner for the world’s top sports brands, leverages data through CJ Affiliate and publisher NMPi to dynamically change PPC bid strategy growing revenue and reducing cost through the affiliate channel.
item.content:encoded: Fanatics, the leading e-commerce partner for the world’s top sports brands, leverages data through CJ Affiliate and publisher NMPi to dynamically change PPC bid strategy growing revenue and reducing cost through the affiliate channel.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Financial Services Brand Grows Lead Quality & Incremental Sales with CJ
item.description: A well-known financial services brand leveraged CJ Affiliate’s VIP Influencer Campaigns to connect with targeted influencers to grow lead quality and generate incremental sales.
item.content:encoded: A well-known financial services brand leveraged CJ Affiliate’s VIP Influencer Campaigns to connect with targeted influencers to grow lead quality and generate incremental sales.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Fortune 500 Retailer Drives Incremental Revenue using CJ Customer-Level Omni-Channel Insights
item.description: A Fortune 500 retailer drives significant, incremental revenue by leveraging CJ’s Affiliate Customer Insights to understand offline consumer behavior.
item.content:encoded: A Fortune 500 retailer drives significant, incremental revenue by leveraging CJ’s Affiliate Customer Insights to understand offline consumer behavior.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: IHG Leverages CJ to Shift Consumer Perception and Increase Direct Bookings
item.description: With an increasing cost of sale due to consumer booking behaviour shifting to a reliance on third party vendors, InterContinental Hotels Group looked to CJ Affiliate to drive an increase in direct-to-brand bookings.
item.content:encoded: With an increasing cost of sale due to consumer booking behaviour shifting to a reliance on third party vendors, InterContinental Hotels Group looked to CJ Affiliate to drive an increase in direct-to-brand bookings.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Lucky Brand Increases Traffic & Engagement through CJ's VIP Influencer Campaigns
item.description: Premium denim and apparel company, Lucky Brand, leverages the CJ Affiliate VIP Influencer Campaigns to connect with key influencers to drive increased traffic and brand engagement.
item.content:encoded: Premium denim and apparel company, Lucky Brand, leverages the CJ Affiliate VIP Influencer Campaigns to connect with key influencers to drive increased traffic and brand engagement.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Lifestyle Blogger Sees Revenue Growth through Audience Expansion
item.description: Lifestyle blogger Jo-Lynne Shane gained new advertisers, increased publisher commissions, and boosted ad sales revenue after a CJ Content-Certified designation. A YOY comparison of results from October - March proves CJ's Content Solution successful.
item.content:encoded: Lifestyle blogger Jo-Lynne Shane gained new advertisers, increased publisher commissions, and boosted ad sales revenue after a CJ Content-Certified designation. A YOY comparison of results from October - March proves CJ's Content Solution successful.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Online Design Marketplace Connects with Influencers to Drive Targeted Traffic
item.description:
An online design marketplace increased brand engagement and sales by employing CJ's Content Solution and the VIP Influencer Campaign to drive targeted traffic to their website.

 

Results at a Glance:
item.content:encoded:
An online design marketplace increased brand engagement and sales by employing CJ's Content Solution and the VIP Influencer Campaign to drive targeted traffic to their website.

item.title: Finance Content Publishers Forge New Relationships, Increase Revenue
item.description: Finance content publishers Debt Roundup and Frugal Rules established new, relevant relationships leading to a year-over-year increase in revenue after using CJ's Content Solution to break through the noise in affiliate.
item.content:encoded: Finance content publishers Debt Roundup and Frugal Rules established new, relevant relationships leading to a year-over-year increase in revenue after using CJ's Content Solution to break through the noise in affiliate.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Outdoor Apparel Retailer Increases Revenue During Critical Holiday Sales Season
item.description: An outerwear retail company increases YOY sales during the ever-important Thanksgiving sales week by leveraging CJ’s Affiliate Customer Insights to rank publishers by revenue, new customer acquisition numbers, and online to offline influence.
item.content:encoded: An outerwear retail company increases YOY sales during the ever-important Thanksgiving sales week by leveraging CJ’s Affiliate Customer Insights to rank publishers by revenue, new customer acquisition numbers, and online to offline influence.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Specialty Retailer Increases NTF Customers & Revenue, Maintain ROAS
item.description: A woman's specialty retailer increases new-to-file (NTF) customers—and revenue—while maintaining return on ad spend (ROAS), by tracking and analyzing customer behavior with CJ's Affiliate Customer Insights.
item.content:encoded: A woman's specialty retailer increases new-to-file (NTF) customers—and revenue—while maintaining return on ad spend (ROAS), by tracking and analyzing customer behavior with CJ's Affiliate Customer Insights.
item.dc:creator: CJ
